content:
Craft an item of type: oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "smooth_stone_slab", "quantity": 59, "index": 10}, {"type": "wooden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 45, "index": 13}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 41}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft oak_wood. Oak_wood requires placing 4 oak_log side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the oak_log from slot 41 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "smooth_stone_slab", "quantity": 59, "index": 10}, {"type": "wooden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 45, "index": 13}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 3, "index": 41}]

thought: Since the oak_log has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another oak_log to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the oak_log to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "smooth_stone_slab", "quantity": 59, "index": 10}, {"type": "wooden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 45, "index": 13}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 41}]
thought: Since the oak_log has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another oak_log below it. Slot 4 is below slot 1, and therefore I will move the oak_log to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "smooth_stone_slab", "quantity": 59, "index": 10}, {"type": "wooden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 45, "index": 13}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 41}]

thought: Since the oak_log has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another oak_log to the right of it. Slot 5 is to the right of slot 4, and therefore I will move the oak_log to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: oak_wood
inventory=[{"type": "oak_wood", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "oak_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "smooth_stone_slab", "quantity": 59, "index": 10}, {"type": "wooden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "chorus_fruit", "quantity": 45, "index": 13}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}]
thought: Now I can craft the oak_wood by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 3
